title: Philippi Knipschildt I.U.D. & Reipubl. Esslingensis Syndici, &c. Tractatus De Fideicommissis Familiarum Nobilium, Von Stamm-Gütern
creator: Knipschildt, Philippus  Weinheimerus, Adamus  Kreidenmann, Joannes Conradus  Harsdôrfferus, Georgius Philippus

source: Knipschildt, Philippus  Weinheimerus, Adamus  Kreidenmann, Joannes Conradus  Harsdôrfferus, Georgius Philippus: Philippi Knipschildt I.U.D. & Reipubl. Esslingensis Syndici, &c. Tractatus De Fideicommissis Familiarum Nobilium, Von Stamm-Gütern  Sive De Bonis, Quæ Pro Familiarum Nobilium conservatione constituuntur ; Advocatis, Iurisperitis, Procuratoribus atque Notariis omnibus utilis ac neceßarius, & duplici Indice, uno Capitum, altero Rerum & verborum locupletißimus. Coloniae  Berlin 1715
